author: YamiKaitou#8975
name: Lottery
description: Play a Lucky3 'scratcher', a Daily Drawing, or a Weekly Drawing
install_msg:
Thanks for installing the cog, please note that this cog is currently in Beta status while the 3 games are being worked on.
I'm in the Cog Support server if you need help with anything. Make sure you take a look under `[p]lottoset` before getting started, the games are disabled by default
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
